headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KATZ, CHASHIE ANNE

snippet: KATZ--Chashie Anne, 94. Born in Glasgow, Scotland. Passed peacefully on March 26, 2016. Beloved wife for 61 years of Samuel (2010). Devoted mother to Carol and Sharon (Ken). Proud and loving grandmother to Brittlyn, Spencer, Abigail and Casey. A woman of strength, kindness, common sense, goodness and beauty whose lilting brogue enchanted all who heard it. An irreplaceable woman who will live on forever in the hearts and minds of all who knew her. Riverside Chapel, 76th and Amster- dam, Tuesday, March 29 at 11:15am. 1/3
